name: Sertanejo de raiz
description: Earliest form of Sertanejo, emerging in pre-World War II rural Brazil during the late 1920s; quickly strummed acoustic guitars, most commonly the 10-string viola caipira and classical guitar, and a highly emotive vocal style.

children.name: Moda de viola
children.description: Style of Sertanejo de raiz predominant in southeast, south, and west-central Brazil.
